Class Unit

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Unit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Selectable
public abstract class Unit
extends greenfoot.Actor
implements Selectable, java.io.Serializable

Handles the basic features that all Units will have, mainly pathfinding.

Version:
Alpha 2.0
Author:
Alston Lin, Daniel Chung, James Ly, Jesmin Hondell
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Unit

public Unit(Player owner,
            Cell cell,
            Map map)
Creates a new Unit; this should only be called from a subclass.

Parameters:
cell - The Cell that the unit will spawn in
map - The Map that this will be put in
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Called before every frame is rendered; every Unit's automatic behavior: Moves to new cell if free cell is available Empties the old cell to make it traversable

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

arrive

public abstract void arrive()
What happens when the Unit arrives at the destination Cell

calculateNewLocation

public void calculateNewLocation(Map map)
Calculates the new position of this Unit after the map has changed.

Parameters:
The - map that this Unit is in

findPath

protected void findPath()
                 throws NoPossiblePathException
Creates a path using Breadth First Search to the given cell; attempts to find the shortest possible path, or throws an IllegalStateException if not possible.

Throws:
NoPossiblePathException - The Cell cannot be reached
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The destination Cell deos not exist
NoPossiblePathException - There is no possible path to the given Cell

resize

public void resize(double percentChange,
                   Map map)
Resizes the Unit and repositions it approriately based on the percent changed.

Parameters:
percentChange - The percent of the size of the new map compared to the old map
map - The Map that this Unit is in

selectCell

public void selectCell(Cell cell)
When the user selects the Unit to go to a specific Cell: - the selected cell is set as a target - the unit is classified '!following', i.e. it is not tracking another unit - a path is calculated to the cell Will ignore multiple selections of the same cell.

Parameters:
cell - The cell that is to be set as a destination

selectUnit

public void selectUnit(Unit unit)
When the user selects the Unit to go to a specific unit: - the selected unit is set as a target - the unit is classified 'following', i.e. it is tracking another unit - a path is calculated to the unit Will ignore multiple selections of the same unit.

Parameters:
unit - The unit that is to be set as a destination

setPath

public void setPath(java.util.LinkedList<Cell> path)
Parameters:
The - new path of this Cell

setSpawned

public void setSpawned(boolean spawned)
Parameters:
The - new value of spawn

takeDamage

public void takeDamage(double damage)
Deducts the given damage from this unit's hitpoints. Unit is destroyed if out of hitpoints

Parameters:
damage - Amount of damage
type - Type of damage

updateImage

public void updateImage(Map map)
Updates the image according to the current map zoom.

Parameters:
map - The Map that this Unit is in
